body.p: NOTE: The mailing lists are being phased out and most of the discussions now happen on the GStreamer Discourse instance. Users who prefer to use e-mail can configure their Discourse accounts to behave like a mailing-list, more information here.
Announcements, including new releases, will be posted on the News and Announcements Discourse category. Users can subscribe to that category.
There are currently eight mailing lists for GStreamer:

UL.p: Used for announcements of new versions, features, etc.

Any and all discussions about GStreamer, GStreamer integration, application development with GStreamer and plugin development with GStreamer. Ask here if you have problems with GStreamer. Please submit patches and bug reports in GitLab and not on the mailing list.
Development of GStreamer wrappers for OpenMax components.
Development of GStreamer for Android integration.
Discussion of building, optimising, developing and using GStreamer on embedded devices.
This mailing list is no longer in use. You can subscribe to notification about issues and merge requests in GitLab).
